description: Retrieves the details of a specific permission group.

parameters.name: permissionGroupId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the permission group.

nested_items.name: permissionGroup
nested_items.description: The structure for a permission group.

nested_items.name: permissionGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the permission group.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the permission group.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A brief description for the permission group.

nested_items.name: applicationPermissions
nested_items.description: Indicates the permissions that are granted to a specific group for accessing the FinSpace application.
CreateDataset --- Group members can create new datasets.
ManageClusters --- Group members can manage Apache Spark clusters from FinSpace notebooks.

ManageUsersAndGroups --- Group members can manage users and permission groups. This is a privileged permission that allows users to grant themselves or others access to any functionality in the application. It should only be granted to trusted users.
ManageAttributeSets --- Group members can manage attribute sets.
ViewAuditData --- Group members can view audit data.
AccessNotebooks --- Group members will have access to FinSpace notebooks.
GetTemporaryCredentials --- Group members can get temporary API credentials.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the group was created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Describes the last time the permission group was updated. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: membershipStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the user within a permission group.
ADDITION_IN_PROGRESS --- The user is currently being added to the permission group.
ADDITION_SUCCESS --- The user is successfully added to the permission group.
REMOVAL_IN_PROGRESS --- The user is currently being removed from the permission group.
